meanings.sent1: The banana had a peelable skin that came off easily.
meanings.sent2: The stickers on the fruit were peelable, making them simple to remove.
meanings.sent3: I tried to peel a peelable sticker off my friend's back as a prank.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a peelable layer, revealing her true happiness underneath.
meanings.sent5: The paint on the wall was so peelable, it felt like peeling a giant sticker.

meanings.definition: Able to be removed by peeling.
meanings.sent1: The label on the jar was peelable, making it easy to read the instructions.
meanings.sent2: The tape on the box was peelable, allowing for quick access to the contents.
meanings.sent3: She pretended to be a peelable label, sticking to different surfaces playfully.
meanings.sent4: The layers of secrets were like peelable curtains, slowly revealing the truth.
meanings.sent5: The memories were so vivid, they felt like peelable layers of time.
